page.title: 17PUBLIC TRANSPORT IN BOURNE
page.content: { The Delaine Bus Company}runs services to Spalding,Peterborough and Stamford. As there is no railway running through Bourne this bus service is very important to the area. People who live in some of the villages need to come into Bourne to Doctors' Surgeries, Banks and the Post Office _(especially for pensions and family allowances ). The Company was started in 1920 with 1 bus. In 1985 the Company has 18 buses-6 double & 12 single deckers.22 people work as drivers,conductors, cleaners & mechanics. The Company now provides a{Town {Service}bringing mainly old age pensioners from the outskirts of the town to the shopping centre.The {Service to the villages}is helpful on market days.Many people find the Delaine Bus Service invaluable.
